title: FarStone Total Backup Recovery Server v10.10 Incl.Keymaker-CORE
description:
FarStone Total Backup Recovery Server v10.10

   FarStone Total Backup Recovery is a Trusted Server Backup, System    
   Restore, and Disk Cloning Solution. Total Backup Recovery backup      
   entire hard drive & partitions, selected files & folders, or only    
   the changes on daily, weekly or monthly schedule automatically.      
   Total Backup Recovery supports all latest hardware systems.          
                                                                         




   Total Backup Recovery Key Features

   Supports Windows 10/8/7/XP/Vista and Windows servers 2016/2012/2008/2003
   Restore files and the whole system in minutes
   View file contents and the system back-in-time
   Backup multiple copies on different locations
   Backup to clouds, such as Sky Drive, DropBox, Google Drive
   Support Windows BitLocker and Windows Encryption File System (EFS)
   Repair tools for repairing boot issues
   Complete, incremental, and differential backup
   Restore your PC OEM factory recovery partition,
   including the hot-key feature unique!
   Open file and database backup
   Create bootable USB (and CD) from system (Dynamic PE generation) unique!
   Backup to remote ftp server
   AES 256 bit encryption, compression, and password
   Universal/dissimilar restore
   Daily, weekly or monthly backup scheduler
   Rapid restore to restore a system in minutes unique!
   Perfect Defrag unique!
   Remote administration console
   Multiple email notifications
   Script commands of scheduled backups
   Partition tools (Recovery Manager)
   Disk backup in a secure environment (Recovery Manager)
   Rescue files from a failed system (Recovery Manager)
   Convert to VMware or Hyper-v (P2V and V2P)
   Bare-metal system restore
   Supports SecureBoot, UEFI, GPT, Dynamic Disk and RAID Systems
   Supports a single hard disks and SSDs up to 8TB or a Raid of any size
   Supports FAT32, NTFS, EFS, and Windows REFS file system



   Total Backup Recovery Server
   Operating System Supported

   Windows 2016/2012/2008 (32 & 64-bit)
   Exchange, SQL, Sharepoint, & Hyper-v
   Application Server running Windows servers


   All kinds of storages are supported, including:

   Hard Drive (250MB/320MB/500MB/750MB/1TB/2TB/3TB/4TB/6TB and bigger)
   Branded Hard Drive (WD, Seagate, Toshiba, Fujitsu), and others
   SSD and size
   UEFI/EFI, BIOS, MBR, GPT disk
   RAID (soft RAID and hardware RAID)


   Backup Destination

   Drives (Internal Hard Drive, External USB Hard Drive,
   USB Flash, SSD (Solid State Drive), Firewire (IEEE 1394) Device)
   Network Share Folder, Network Drive, NAS (Network Attached Storage),
   iSCSI, and iPSAN Storage
   RAID 0/1/5/10/JBOD Disk Array
   Clouds
   CDR/RW and DVD+-R/RW
   FTP Offsite Backup





  [INSTALLATION]



    - Yet another Riddle by CORE!! And It goes like this,

    - Unrar with you favorite archiver, such as WinRar

    - Run Setup and Install,
    is advised to install in the default directory

    - Run Keymaker-CORE with ADMIN Rights and Generate Serial

    - Insert Serial in Installation Window (do not close the keymaker)

    - Whait til finnish....

    - Use "Other Activation Options" when the software asks
    you to activate

    - Ok, It's Activated!
